feed.title: Track Awesome Fiber Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: ✨ A curated list of awesome Fiber middlewares, boilerplates, recipes, articles and tools.

entry.title: Awesome Fiber Updates on May 19, 2025
entry.content:
⚙️ Middlewares / 🌱 Third Party

  • narmadaweb/limiter (⭐1) - A high-performance Redis-backed rate limiter middleware for Fiber, supporting fixed window, sliding window, and token bucket algorithms.

entry.title: Awesome Fiber Updates on May 17, 2025
entry.content:
⚙️ Middlewares / 🌱 Third Party

  • shareed2k/fiber_limiter (⭐14) - Limiter using redis as store for rate limit with two algorithms for choosing sliding window, gcra leaky bucket.
  • beyer-stefan/gofiber-minifier (⭐2) - Minifying middleware for HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
  • narmadaweb/gonify (⭐1) - Fiber Minifying middleware for HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Json, XML and SVG.

entry.content:
⚙️ Middlewares / 🌱 Third Party

  • newrelic/go-agent (⭐800) - Official New Relic middleware for Fiber that manages instrumentation for New Relic monitoring.

entry.title: Awesome Fiber Updates on May 04, 2025
entry.content:
⚙️ Middlewares / 🌱 Third Party

  • apitally/apitally-go (⭐2) - Simple API monitoring tool for Fiber. Tracks API usage, errors, and performance, and includes request logging and alerting features.

entry.title: Awesome Fiber Updates on Feb 12, 2025
entry.content:
⚙️ Middlewares / 🧬 Core

  • Compress (⭐37k) - Compression middleware for Fiber, it supports deflate, gzip and brotli by default.

⚙️ Middlewares / 🌱 Third Party

  • zeiss/fiber-goth (⭐5) - Simple middleware to integrate authentication to your Fiber applications.

🚧 Boilerplates / 🌱 Third Party

  • efectn/fiber-boilerplate (⭐81) - Simple and scalable boilerplate to build powerful and organized REST projects with Fiber.
  • ingeniousambivert/fiber-bootstrapped (⭐2) - A toolkit for Go projects embracing a service-centric architecture, inspired by the principles of FeathersJS.

📁 Recipes / 🌱 Third Party

  • alpody/golang-fiber-realworld-example-app (⭐136) - Example real world backend API built with Fiber, Gorm, Swagger.
  • paundraP/golang-starter-template (⭐6) - Golang REST API with authentication, authorization, and integrated payment gateway support.

entry.title: Awesome Fiber Updates on May 28, 2023
entry.content:
⚙️ Middlewares / 🧬 Core

  • Adaptor (⭐37k) - Converter for net/http handlers to/from Fiber request handlers.
  • Earlydata (⭐37k) - Early data support for Fiber.
  • Helmet (⭐37k) - Helps secure your apps by setting various HTTP headers.
  • Idempotency (⭐37k) - Idempotency middleware for Fiber allows for fault-tolerant APIs where duplicate requests.
  • Keyauth (⭐37k) - Key auth middleware provides a key based authentication.
  • Redirect (⭐37k) - Redirect middleware for Fiber.
  • Rewrite (⭐37k) - Rewrite middleware rewrites the URL path based on provided rules. It can be helpful for backward compatibility or just creating cleaner and more descriptive links.

  • GalvinGao/gofiber-template (⭐123) - A production-ready, container-first opinionated gofiber project template. Config by envvars, DI by go.uber.org/fx, Database by uptrace/bun, with out-of-the-box MVC folder structure and CI/CD support.

entry.title: Awesome Fiber Updates on Mar 28, 2022
entry.content:
⚙️ Middlewares / 🌱 Third Party

  • shareed2k/fiber_tracing (⭐12) - Middleware trace requests on Fiber framework with OpenTracing API.
  • ansrivas/fiberprometheus (⭐199) - Prometheus middleware for gofiber.
  • sacsand/gofiber-firebaseauth (⭐25) - Fiber Firebase Auth Middleware.
  • aschenmaker/fiber-health-check (⭐10) - Health-check middleware support health-check for Fiber️ framework.
  • elastic/apmfiber (⭐421) - APM Agent for Go Fiber.
  • eozer/fiber_ldapauth (⭐4) - LDAP Authentication Middleware for Fiber.

🚧 Boilerplates / 🌱 Third Party

  • gofiber/boilerplate (⭐477) - Official fiber boilerplate.
  • fiber-boilerplate (⭐284) - A boilerplate for the Fiber web framework.
  • sujit-baniya/fiber-boilerplate (⭐424) - Boilerplate on the top of fiber web framework with many middlewares and features.
  • create-go-app/fiber-go-template (⭐1k) - Fiber backend template for Create Go App CLI.
  • embedmode/fiberseed (⭐40) - Fiber boilerplate api with many middlewares.

📁 Recipes / 🌱 Third Party

  • kiyonlin/fiblar-demo (⭐3) - Fiber v1 + angular demo.
  • koddr/tutorial-go-fiber-rest-api (⭐396) - Tutorial for building a restful api with fiber.
  • firebase007/go-rest-api-with-fiber (⭐57) - Demo project with fiber, logging, basicAuth and postgresql.
  • chawk/go_fiber_quickstart (⭐18) - Fiber quick start example project.
  • EricLau1/go-fiber-auth-api (⭐55) - Golang Authentication API with Fiber MongoDB and JWT.

🤖 Benchmarks / 🌱 Third Party

  • TechEmpower - Project provides performance measures across a wide field of web application frameworks.
  • web-frameworks-benchmark - Project aims to measure the differences between the various programming language frameworks.
  • go-web-framework-benchmark (⭐2.1k) - This benchmark suite aims to compare the performance of Go web frameworks.

entry.title: Awesome Fiber Updates on Feb 28, 2022
entry.content:
⚙️ Middlewares / 🧬 Core

  • BasicAuth (⭐37k) - Basic auth middleware provides an HTTP basic authentication. It calls the next handler for valid credentials and 401 Unauthorized for missing or invalid credentials.
  • Cache (⭐37k) - Intercept and cache responses.
  • CORS (⭐37k) - Enable cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) with various options.
  • CSRF (⭐37k) - Protect from CSRF exploits.
  • Encrypt Cookie (⭐37k) - Encrypt middleware which encrypts cookie values.
  • ETag (⭐37k) - ETag middleware that lets caches be more efficient and save bandwidth, as a web server does not need to resend a full response if the content has not changed.
  • Expvar (⭐37k) - Expvar middleware that serves via its HTTP server runtime exposed variants in the JSON format.
  • Favicon (⭐37k) - Ignore favicon from logs or serve from memory if a file path is provided.
  • FileSystem (⭐37k) - FileSystem middleware for Fiber, special thanks and credits to Alireza Salary.
  • Limiter (⭐37k) - Rate-limiting middleware. Use to limit repeated requests to public APIs and/or endpoints such as password reset.
  • Logger (⭐37k) - HTTP request/response logger.
  • Monitor (⭐37k) - Monitor middleware that reports server metrics, inspired by express-status-monitor.
  • Pprof (⭐37k) - Pprof middleware that serves via its HTTP server runtime profiling data in the format expected by the pprof visualization tool.
  • Proxy (⭐37k) - Allows you to proxy requests to a multiple servers.
  • Recover (⭐37k) - Recover middleware recovers from panics anywhere in the stack chain and handles the control to the centralized ErrorHandler.
  • RequestID (⭐37k) - Adds a requestid to every request.
  • Session (⭐37k) - Session middleware. NOTE: This middleware uses our Storage package.
  • Skip (⭐37k) - Skip middleware that skips a wrapped handler is a predicate is true.
  • Timeout (⭐37k) - Adds a max time for a request and forwards to ErrorHandler if it is exceeded.

⚙️ Middlewares / 🔗 External

  • storage (⭐298) - Premade storage drivers that implement the Storage interface, designed to be used with various Fiber middlewares.
  • template (⭐294) - This package contains 8 template engines that can be used with Fiber v1.10.x Go version 1.13 or higher is required.

⚙️ Middlewares / ‍💻 Contrib

  • fibersentry (⭐262) - Sentry support for Fiber.
  • fiberzap (⭐262) - Zap logging support for Fiber.
  • otelfiber (⭐262) - OpenTelemetry support for Fiber.
  • paseto (⭐262) - PASETO returns a Web Token (PASETO) auth middleware.
  • swagger (⭐262) - Swagger middleware for Fiber. The middleware handles Swagger UI.

📁 Recipes / 🌱 Third Party

  • gofiber/recipes (⭐3.3k) - Official Fiber cookbook.

🛠️ Tools / 🌱 Third Party

  • go-dawn/dawn (⭐19) - Dawn is an opinionated web framework that provides rapid development capabilities which on top of Fiber.
  • tompston/gomakeme (⭐11) - Generate boilerplate + endpoints for Fiber or Gin REST APIs.

📖 Articles / 🌱 Third Party

  • Go Fiber by Examples: How can the Fiber Web Framework be useful?
  • Build a RESTful API on Go: Fiber, PostgreSQL, JWT and Swagger docs in isolated Docker containers
  • Getting started with Fiber
  • Fiber v1.9.6 How to improve performance by 817% and stay fast, flexible and friendly?
  • Create a travel list app with Go, Fiber, Angular, MongoDB and Google Cloud Secret Manager
  • Is switching from Express to Fiber worth it?
  • Fiber v1.8. What's new, updated and re-thinked?
  • Fiber released v1.7! What's new and is it still fast, flexible and friendly?
